name: Sleepers Act 1 Alpha
description:
Built in Unreal Engine 4, Sleepers is a 2D sidescroller survival horror currently in development. We're revealing the first playable alpha which will be Act 1 of the demo. Acts 2 and 3 will be available short after, along with the launch of our Kickstarter!

The project can be found on:

Tumblr

Twitter

IndieDB

Steam Greenlight

Website

Merchandise:

Society6

Controls:

WASD-Move

E-Interact

Space-Open door/load next area when arrow appears/skip cinematic scene
